title: Is there a way to check if and what current punishments are on your account?
body: I know most of the time its quite obvious if you get banned for a while then it straight up tells you "your account is suspended for X amount of time due to X" but some of the minor punishments such as the low priority queue and chat restrictions have a rather ambiguous amount of games that it takes to serve them and unless you were keeping a tally you usually forget. All I want is a status to be view able somewhere in the client about these things before I start a game with friends so I don't drag them into the low priority queue with me.

replies.body: In the top right corner of all the official League of Legends websites next to the notifications is a box with an exclamation mark '!' clicking on that box will allow you to see all notifications from riot directly to you (suspensions, warning, bans etc.)

chat restriction says in the top right corner of client either after finishing a game, logging in or every hour, low priority also says it in top right corner after games or every hour

and added with top right corner, on log in it gives you a ticket, it also says in your email.
